title: Possible bug???
body:
So I was playing kat, and suddenly my q,r, and b all stopped working, as you can imagine I was pretty mad, as you don't get many kills with e and w. Eventually, I decided to kill jg creatures and started with enemy wolves, which suddenly brought back my q,r, and b. I have seen this on other report a bug type things recently as well when I googled it. Does anyone have any idea how to prevent it?
Also on a different note, I have 5k saved up atm and am lvl 15, how much do I need to save up for a good amount of runes, don't really want champs atm, as I am cool with Kat/Ashe/Nid/Riven. 
Thanks anyone who gives feedback!

replies.body:
Well, usually around 10k is a good to get a decent amount of Tier 3 runes, and maybe a few basic champions.

As for the bug, they belong [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
